INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_AC_FUND_GEN_STMT_REMRK (AC_FUND_GEN_STMT_REMRK_RID, AC_FUND_RID, IS_PRIMY, LANG_TYP, REMRK_FR_STMT, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES (#{item.acFundGenStmtRemrkRid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.acFundRid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isPrimy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.langTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remrkFrStmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
